name: Fence Painter
desc: Write an algorithm that counts the number of ways you can paint a fence with N posts using K colors such that no more than 2 adjacent fence posts are painted with the same color.
code_ruby:
# @param n, integer k, integer
# @return integer
def num_colors(n, k)
end
